gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceIncomeAndExpenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Expenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Expenses` SHOULD exist at least once with `ConsolidatedMember`, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Income` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_Income')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_Income return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Income` SHOULD exist at least once with `ConsolidatedMember`, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
